title: Issues Updating Client.
body:
Well, Hello Fellow Summoners, I went on league yesterday to see this new update and I haven't heard anything about this for a while, I tried googling the error and still no luck on how to fix this, Apparently it is a server side error which I am not completely sure on but this is the error I get everytime I try and patch the new update. http://prntscr.com/6lwmsp I deleted LoL and it still does the same thing, disconnected re-connected it. If this is a server side issue I would like to know as the waiting game. Thanks.

TL;DR server issue http://prntscr.com/6lwmsp can't fix help me
-Hayden.

replies.body: I figured it out! What I did was I went to my AVG and turned firewall off completely, so It's no longer on, I loaded my client and it runs fine, try going into AVG, Options, Firewall settings, Then click 'Disable Firewall protection', Hope it helped ya out.
Same issue and get stuck at 33%. tried some online fixes like changing region and doing a repair check but still no luck. any help?

> [{quoted}](name=rellik111,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=vlBVxkUh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-27T17:27:28.562+0000)
>
> Same issue and get stuck at 33%. tried some online fixes like changing region and doing a repair check but still no luck. any help?

Mine doesn't even load at all, Mine opens and says this straight away, so I can't do anything, I can't repair either.
Sorry for the late reply I was a littler busy I added the picture.
Could you attach the screenshot using the board's utilities? Clicking on random links from people on the internet is a sure-fire way to get a virus, so I don't like to click them.
